department.dept_long_name: Department of the History of Art and Architecture

course.title: The Vatican
course.description: Colloquium aimed at undergraduates on the Vatican palace including the Fran Angelico's chapel for Nicholas V, the Raphael stanze, the Loggia of Raphael, the Sistine Chapel including the Michelangelo frescoes and the Raphael tapestries, the Cortile del Belvedere, Julius II's statue court and collections, the Tower of the Winds and Gallery of Maps, the Vatican Library, the Vatican Museums, as well as an overview of old and new St. Peters under Bramante, Michelangelo, Maderno and Bernini
